translations: [劳经]食利者；靠收租生活的人；靠股息生活的人

sentences.sentence: After all, Keynes talked about the "euthanasia of the rentier".
sentences.translation: 毕竟，凯恩斯提到过食利者的“安乐死”问题。

sentences.sentence: And oil importers, who rely on remittances and aid from oil exporting countries, have all the characteristics of a rentier state-without the resources.
sentences.translation: 而这些依靠外汇和接受石油出口国援助的石油进口国，则具备所有典型的食利国的特点：唯独没有资源。
